name: Target of Opportunity

sections.body: When an ally who also has this feat makes a ranged attack and hits an opponent within 30 feet of you, you can spend an immediate action to make a single ranged attack against that opponent. Your ranged weapon must be in hand, loaded, and ready to be fired or thrown for you to make the ranged attack.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You and your allies pelt your enemies with a deadly barrage of missiles.
